rewrite1: For the initial paragraph: italicize the text, adjust the font size to 10.5 points, and align the text to the right.
rewrite2: Begin by italicizing the text in the first paragraph. Then adjust the font size to 10.5 points and align the paragraph to the right.
rewrite3: Make the text of the opening paragraph italic, adjust the font size to 10.5 points, and align the text to the right.
